---
title: "STAT 5700 formulas"
format: pdf
---

$(A \cup B)' = A' \cap B'$

$(A \cap B)' = A' \cup B'$

$P(A) = 1 - P(A')$

$P(A \cup B) = P(A) + P(B) - P(A \cap B)$

$_nP_r =\frac{n!}{(n-r)!}$

$_nC_r = \frac{_nP_r}{r!} = \frac{n!}{(n - r)!r!}$

$P(B | A) = \frac{P(A \cap B)}{P(A)}$

$P(B'|A) = 1 - P(B|A)$

Bayes Rule: $P(A|B) = \frac{P(B|A)P(A)}{P(B)}$
